name: Choose your candy (josioque)
description:
Choose and encarnate a candy that has been eaten by a human, and follow this candy through the process of digestion. Disolve the candy with the body molecules that appears at the chill rythm of the song Deep House: https://licensing.jamendo.com/es/track/1518641/deep-house

A short game developed within 72 hours from the MiniJam 66 :https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-66-sweets

Programming: Raúl "Lindryn" López Martín (https://lindryn.itch.io/), Jose "Josioque" Blázquez Alba (https://josioque.itch.io/)

Artist: Christian Villanueva (https://christianvillanueva.itch.io/), Abraham "Pirty" Juárez (https://itch.io/profile/pirty)
